tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Soham is a thorough professional, and I would highly recommend him. He is very caring, and have followed up personally multiple times, and checked on me. He gave sufficient time to review my case, researched it to come up with the way he would go about, and was very meticulous with the whole process. Mine was a very complicated and delicate gum surgery, and I am extremely satisfied with the way he operated upon and during the follow up visits.
Thanks Dr Soham

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: With an eternal fear of dentists, I reached Picasso dental studio two weeks back with many dental concerns. Dr.Soham Chatterjee was very patient to address all my concerns and fears and started the treatment promptly. He explained all the steps of the treatment and how to maintain my dental health in great depth. The clinic itself is kept at a great condition and the staff is extremely professional. I have been to dentists before but this has been my best experience so far. Looking forward to continue my dental journey at Picasso.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Soham's Picasso Dental Clinic last week for dental check up and gum bleeding issue, its a very good dental clinic in park street with the latest equipments, great facilities and looks like a studio. Upon arrival i was attended by a receptionist who quickly took the required information, and as soon as my turn came Dr. Soham did a thorough check up and understood my problem quickly, he is  young and intelligent dentist and knows his job very well and is very confident dentist to perform all the required surgeries. He also taught me the basics of keeping my tooth healthy, and gave me a free toothbrush. i came to know since long i was not taking care of my teeth but now i will be taking care of it. I am happy I went to Doctor Soham Chatterjee who is a great dentist and will recommend a must visit for any dental problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a wonderful experience and Dr.Soham treated my teeth problems veey calmly. He gave me appointment within 5 mins of calling him. Will definately recommend him for his great sevices

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

**** ****** ****** ** ******* *** most friendly doctor I have ever met.
Super clinic and very friendly staff.
Excellent after visits experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,
review: I am a patient of Dr Soham for a while now, i wonder why I did not get myself to write a review earlier, my bad. I have got RCT done, extraction done and am in the process for a couple of implants.  I must say that in my 32 years of service i was not lucky enough to get painless dental treatment ever. Dr Soham is not only a thorough professional but also a gentle soul. He has a state of art dental studio and uses the latest techniques and dental materials prevalent in the world. The staff employed  in the studio is very professional and  courteous. I wish him and his team of expert doctors and staff a very fulfilling and a rewarding future. His team has brought smiles to numerous faces including mine. Kudos and thanks a ton. Highly highly recommended !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ******* ** ******* Dr.Soham clearly explained the various options I had to get my front tooth issue rectified & let me choose the best option that suited my budget , time & overall outcome I wanted. 
He maintains very high standards in dentistry using only the best tools & products. I was made to feel completely at ease & the experience was painless. The results were fantastic,  I am super happy that now I can smile without being conscious of my teeth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Soham isn’t only an expert but a compassionate human being. He eases you into procedures knowing very well that a visit to the dentist is always daunting. I had my teeth cleaned and the results are more than satisfactory. He even gave me a primer on how to brush, and what I need to do to ensure better gum health. 

I’d recommend visiting him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Soham has a spotless highly professional, State of the Art clinic, he is polite, spends time examining and then explains the problem and procedures. 
Never pushes or alarms you towards any immediate decision . He is great at his job and the pain felt (even in a root canal job)  is almost nil. He has a great team of highly experienced Doctors who are also excellent at their job and make you feel safe.
Another nice thing I noticed was the friendly polite helpful Staff. 
Our entire family has shifted over to his Practice, I am extremely happy with his treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words :)

review: To begin with, I was most surprised with doctor Soham being extremely punctual with regards to the time he had allowed me. He was extremely professional, and yet so very friendly that he puts you at complete ease, and allowed us more than an hour of his valuable time so that we could understand every single aspect of dental and tooth care procedures which could benefit me... I was most surprised, when Dr. Soham returned half of the fees I had paid him... It's the first time in my life when any medical or dental practitioner has ever voluntarily returned his fees to the patient... ! I highly recommend Dr. Soham and PICASSO STUDIO .. !

review:
As someone who is extremely fearful of dentists and dental treatment, I was a little apprehensive about the way my dental problem will be addressed. Thankfully, while undergoing my treatment, my fear and anxiety were overpowered by the professional and sincere efforts of Dr. Soham Chatterjee. During my initial session, he explained the issue at hand  for me to understand and during my subsequent visits, he informed and educated me before starting any procedure. I had a series of periodontic treatment, flap surgery and bone grafting and he ensured the procedures are seamless.
Dr. Soham has this innate ability to put patient’s fear and anxiety to rest and attends his patients with attention and care. 
I would highly recommend Dr. Soham.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have taken appointment for removal of dental caries as well as dental fillings. Dr.Suham Banerjee removed the caries and in between he left saying that he has urgent work and another lady doctor came in who then proceeded for dental fillings.

When we were about to leave the clinic, we were shocked to see him in the clinic and when enquired, we got to know that he was looking after another patient in another room of the clinic.

Please avoid aesthetica clinic.
reply_text: Hello Mrs Soniya. Apologies for the late response as I had not looked into Practo. I do apologize for the inconvenience caused to you. As a specialist I was asked to attend to an urgent case which had come to the clinic and needed my expertise, as a result of which a senior doctor had taken over your case ensuring your comfort at the same time maintaining the treatment quality. We made sure that quality treatment was provided to you and I am a bit surprised that after the treatment I personally came and checked you again. You were satisfied with the treatment then. If you have any complaints regarding the treatment done do let us know we shall take care of it. The treatment at Aesthetica has been of high quality and we try our best to ensure patient comfort and care.

tags: Value for money,
review: Price is very high ,rest everything is fine bt it's very expensive... doctor was good  and location is also good
reply_text:
Hello. We are sorry you felt that way and that you were unable to understand that good work comes at a price. We are a state of the art clinic trying never to compromise on our patient's quality of work. You wanted us to give you good work at a very minimal charge as per your liking which is not possible as we do send work to one of the premium labs in the country and every work is being done by specialists to give you the best results. We also still tried our best to help you by not charging you for the xray and also giving you discounts from our side which we dont usually do. You did love our work when we showed you our previous patient results. The charges you bargained for is not acceptable to our work quality and standards. We are there to help you out nonetheless. We do our best to do help our patients, but there has to be a limit. It's also unfair to the doctors when patient's put us down because of unfair requests such as this. 
Thank you.
